name: Ant Hell
description:
Tap or Clock screen to move.
Created in 3 hours for Tri-Jam (theme don’t shoot)  using Construct 3 on iOS
You’re an Ant trying to survive, the hellacious landscape that is the yard, with fire ants, wasps, and a killer fungus attacking you from all angles your only defense is to get a shield and hope that enemy bullets bounce back and kill them.

Ran out of time towards the end and could definitely use more polish, my bad.
